allow: Bash(for f in index.html boutique.html location.html apprendre.html galerie.html blog.html article.html suivi.html cgv.html mentions-legales.html credits.html annonce.html seo-diagnostic.html admin.html)

Bash(do sed -i 's|  <link rel=""manifest"" href=""/site.webmanifest"">|  <link rel=""manifest"" href=""/site.webmanifest"">\\n  <!-- Preconnect: faster DNS + TLS for critical external origins -->\\n  <link rel=""preconnect"" href=""https://qnkyzhccudtaduqduoxn.supabase.co"">\\n  <link rel=""preconnect"" href=""https://fonts.googleapis.com"">\\n  <link rel=""preconnect"" href=""https://fonts.gstatic.com"" crossorigin>|' "$f")
Bash(for file in annonce.html boutique.html location.html apprendre.html galerie.html blog.html article.html index.html)

Bash(do sed -i 's|<link rel=""preconnect"" href=""https://qnkyzhccudtaduqduoxn.supabase.co"">|<link rel=""preconnect"" href=""https://qnkyzhccudtaduqduoxn.supabase.co"">\\n  <link rel=""preload"" href=""js/core/config.js?v=3.5.3"" as=""script"">\\n  <link rel=""preload"" href=""js/vendor/supabase.js?v=3.5.3"" as=""script"">\\n  <link rel=""preload"" href=""js/services/supabase-client.js?v=3.5.3"" as=""script"">\\n  <link rel=""preload"" href=""js/services/supabase-sync.js?v=3.5.3"" as=""script"">|' "$file")
